dict.string: "Allow the app to share the location even if you lock your phone or exit the app."
"Receive push notifications about help requests, etc."
"Be able to share location with friends even after you lock your phone or close the app. Only enabled when you create a help request or respond to it."
"Be able to share location with friends even after you lock your phone or close the app. Only enabled when you create a help request or respond to it."
